bookAuthors: Jeaniene Frost, Jeaniene Frost, Sharie Kohler
Plot: In this multi-author anthology, danger beckons in these captivating paranormal tales that will tempt readers to the edge -- and leave them begging for more! * * * * * * * * * * Night's Darkest Embrace Enter the dark realm of Nocturna in Jeaniene Frost's red-hot tale, where blisteringly sexy Raphael dominates the demons of a lawless dimension and tries to help a beautiful young woman avenge her cousin's disappearance. Mate (book 3.5 of the Doomsday Brethren series) In the shadowy world of Shayla Black's , magical warrior Raiden vows to protect his woman and their unborn youngling from evil--and deliver her safely to another man. But once he's saved her, can he let her go? Darkest Temptation (book 4.5 of the Moon Chasers series) Lycans rule the night in Sharie Kohler's suspenseful story, as a fiery woman stalks mysterious Luc, the undeniably hypnotic being she believes can save her from turning -- IF -- she kills him.
